import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Mic, ShoppingBag, Zap, Shield, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; import { useVoice } from '../context/VoiceContext'; /** * Home Page * * Landing page with: * - Hero section introducing voice shopping * - Feature highlights * - Quick actions to start shopping */ function Home() { const { startVoice, isConnected } = useVoice(); const features = [ { icon: Mic, title: 'Voice-Powered Search', description: 'Simply speak to find products. Say "Show me laptops under 50,000" and watch the magic happen.', }, { icon: Zap, title: 'Instant Results', description: 'Get real-time product recommendations with detailed specs and pricing at your fingertips.', }, { icon: Shield, title: 'Smart Filters', description: 'Use natural language to filter by brand, price, category, and more. No complex forms needed.', }, ]; const quickCommands = [ 'Show me mobile phones', 'Laptops under ₹50,000', 'Filter by Samsung', 'Sort by rating', 'Best accessories', ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background decoration */}
{/* Left content */}
Voice Shopping Enabled

Shop with Your Voice

Experience the future of online shopping. Just speak naturally and let our AI assistant find exactly what you're looking for.

Browse Products
{/* Right content - Voice commands showcase */}

Try saying...

{quickCommands.map((command, index) => (
"{command}"
))}
{/* Wave decoration */}
{/* Features Section */}

Shopping Made Simple

No more endless scrolling. Just tell us what you want and we'll find it for you.

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Shopping?

Explore our collection of mobiles, laptops, and accessories. Use your voice or browse manually - it's your choice!

Explore Products
); } export default Home;
